name: JRubyWithNailgun
text: JRuby 1.3.0+ supports execution with Nailgun. Nailgun allows you to start up a single JVM as a background server process and toss it commands from a fast native client. To use Nailgun with JRuby: # Download JRuby 1.3.0 # Start the JRuby nailgun server in the background: jruby --ng-server & # You can now run JRuby commands through that server using the jruby --ng command instead of jruby For more information, read [http://blog.headius.com/2009/05/jruby-nailgun-support-in-130.html]
